name: Redeemer of the Damned
text: You channel the the damned spirits of your tiefling ancestors to battle evil.

features.callingSoulsToBattle(11thLevel): You can spend an action point to teleport yourself and up to five willing allies that you can see to any squares adjacent to a single enemy within 10 squares that you can see
features.redeemer'sReward(11thLevel): Each time you reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points, you or one ally adjacent to you (or to your spirit companion, if you have one) gains a +2 bonus to defenses and saving throws until the end of your next turn
features.spiritShielding(16thLevel): You gain necrotic resistance equal to 5 + one-half your level

flavorText: I do not stand against evil alone. At my side stand the souls of my tiefling ancestors, once cursed to eternity in hell but now seeking salvation for their crimes. Against this force, no evil can escape for long.
